channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13621] compute stats in certain cases fails with NPE
item.description:
FAILED: NullPointerException null
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.getColStatistics(StatsUtils.java:693)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.convertColStats(StatsUtils.java:739)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.getTableColumnStats(StatsUtils.java:728)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.collectStatistics(StatsUtils.java:183)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.collectStatistics(StatsUtils.java:136)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.stats.StatsUtils.collectStatistics(StatsUtils.java:124)
item.summary: compute stats in certain cases fails with NPE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The explain plan in the test shows this:

        Select Operator [SEL_9] (rows=9223372036854775807 width=1)

This seems horribly wrong, no? (might be unrelated, but looks serious).

Should be able to use:

com.google.protobuf.ByteString.EMPTY

instead of your 1 byte array.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12800922/HIVE-13621.1.patch
